aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

fsx:IsBackupCopyDestination.description: Filters access by whether the backup is a destination backup for a CopyBackup operation

fsx:IsBackupCopySource.description: Filters access by whether the backup is a source backup for a CopyBackup operation

fsx:ParentVolumeId.description: Filters access by the containing parent volume for mutating volume operations

fsx:StorageVirtualMachineId.description: Filters access by the containing storage virtual machine for a volume for mutating volume operations
